QuestData.Title: Bilgewater Cartel Represent
QuestData.Description: Looks like the naga down there in the ruins are preparing to invade our Town-In-A-Box. I have lots of dead scouts here as proof.$B$BI don't know about you, but I'm not about to let them try. Let's get the jump on them!$B$BCould you lay the foundation for our new coastal holdings by replacing their banners with our own? That's some prime real estate down there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 10 Naga Banners, replacing them with Bilgewater Cartel Banners.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are still some naga banners down there that need to be 'sploded and replaced!
QuestData.RewardText: I wish I could have seen the looks on their scaly faces when you blew up their banners and replaced them with our own.$B$BOn second thought, I don't want to be close enough to see their snarls.
